game.name: Chambered
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Chambered is a 4-player online co-op adventure where you and your friends are trapped inside a chaotic maze of cube chambers. Work together, avoid deadly traps, use strange items, and try to make it out alive.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Chambered is a 4-player online co-op adventure where you and your friends are trapped inside a chaotic maze of cube chambers. Work together, avoid deadly traps, use strange items, and try to make it out alive.
